1110100001001000 0001001011011111 0 -> sum: 1111101100100111, cout: 0
0101101101100100 0100100101111110 0 -> sum: 1010010011100010, cout: 0
1000100001000101 0101100110001010 0 -> sum: 1110000111001111, cout: 0

1111101101111000 0011110011110111 1 -> sum: 0011100001110000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
